channel.title: Not having a default browser and pressing on "Web Browoser" icon in xfce will give annoying bug
channel.description:
Since we dont have a default browser by default so any user who is morphing debian fresh install he will not have a browser as well (specially debian minimal version like netinst or CD..etc).
This will give annoying show annoying bug:
![havingnobrowser1|609x295](upload://gFxcnUt4rokXKf3uWEgeOTvY5Au.png)
Will show a bug window which you need to press on OK multiple times to disappear:
1 ![havingnobrowser2|620x153](upload://gX2EIkkvPcBMC759OjAQD2M5JsL.png) 2 ![havingnobrowser3|625x149](upload://k1Qtw2gfTFjltczWnhg31T0taAM.png) 3 ![havingnobrowser4|624x149](upload://5OgaIEIfVayVmT8oXEVYar6D3dH.png) 4 ![havingnobrowser5|625x156](upload://AobqDXOQyV4RHZDnJWvPY3V5v5L.png) 5 ![havingnobrowser6|623x149](upload://zQenkdh8HXOqpHCHQurcR6F18ql.png)
